properties.areaDesc: Coastal waters from Little River Inlet to Murrells Inlet SC out 20 nm; Coastal waters from Cape Fear NC to Little River Inlet SC out 20 nm; Coastal waters from Surf City to Cape Fear NC out 20 nm
properties.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued January 3 at 3:46PM EST until January 4 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Wilmington NC
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Dense Fog Advisory, dense fog will reduce
visibility to less than one mile. For the Small Craft
Advisory, southwest winds 15 to 25 kt with gusts up to 35 kt
and seas 4 to 7 feet expected. For the Gale Watch, northwest
winds 20 to 30 kt with gusts up to 40 kt and seas 5 to 8 feet
possible.

* WHERE...Southeast North Carolina and Northeast South Carolina
coastal waters.

* WHEN...For the Dense Fog Advisory, until 7 AM EST Saturday.
For the Small Craft Advisory, until 9 PM EST Saturday. For the
Gale Watch, from Saturday evening through Sunday morning.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds can cause hazardous seas which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility. Low visibility
will make navigation difficult.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should consider altering plans to avoid possible
hazardous conditions.  Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter
course, and/or secure the vessel for severe wind and seas.

If you must navigate, proceed with caution. Use proper fog
signals. Make sure all running lights are on. Remember to use
your radar and compass.

NWSheadline: DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST SATURDAY... ...SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM EST SATURDAY... ...GALE WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY EVENING THROUGH SUNDAY MORNING
